title: Dynamic:01: The Best of DavidLynch.com
overview: Two hours of original content previously only available to paid up members of DavidLynch.com. This Best Of package includes 7 short films plus 3 intervalometer camera experiments. All shorts are written, directed, edited and scored by David Lynch with introductions from David before each item. Also includes 20 minutes of David Lynch answering an interesting variety of questions from members of his website. Contains The Darkened Room, Boat, Lamp, Out Yonder Neighbor Boy, Industrial Soundscape, The Bug Crawls, Inveralometer Experiments, Members Questions.
